data.title: Hyeri celebrates birthday with a night out, a celebration full of warm love
data.meta_description: Girls' Day member and actress Hyeri had a special birthday with various gifts and congratulations.
data.text:
Girls’ Day member and actress Hyeri had a special birthday with various gifts and congratulations.

On June 10th, Hyeri published several photos of herself enjoying a special birthday, and added the caption, “I feel like I received an unusually large number of congratulations. I had a happy day thanks to good people. I will do even better in the future. Thank you for today,”

Hyeri received plenty of congratulations from acquaintances. In particular, the idol-actress also shared the letters and birthday gifts she received from friends, and showed her appreciation. Afterwards, she especially transformed into a princess with a toy crown, earrings, and necklace, showing a happy smile.

Congratulations from Hyeri’s colleagues in the entertainment industry also streamed in. In particular, Girls’ Day members were the first to congratulate her, with Yura commenting, “Happy birthday Hyeri”. Meanwhile, Sojin said, “Aww, you’re cute, my love“, and Minah left emojis of a birthday cake and flowers.

In addition, Jiyeon, Moon Se Yoon, Lee Hyun Yi, and Lee Jung Ha also left congratulatory messages, completing Hyeri ‘s special birthday.

On the other hand, Hyeri recently appeared in ENA’s reality TV show, “HMLYCP”.
